name: All somke test cases for provided url

elements.name: verify that all the labels and testboxes on the DirectShifts page are as per the specification

steps.name: user navigates to the direct shift url
direct shift job apply page loads
user should see all the appropriate labels
user should see all the appropriate textboxes

elements.name: Verify that user is navigated to the sign in page on click on sign in button

steps.name: user navigates to the direct shift url
user click on the sign in button
user should be navigated to sign in page

elements.name: Verify that an error is thrown in the Apply form when user tries to click Apply Now button without entering all the mandatory fields

steps.name: user navigates to the direct shift url
user clicks the apply now button
Error saying that please fill out this field shall be thrown

elements.name: Verify that asterisk is present against all the mandatory fields

steps.name: user navigates to the direct shift url
asterisk shall be present against all the mandatoryField

elements.name: Verify that asterisk is not present against the non mandatory fields

steps.name: user navigates to the direct shift url
asterisk shall not be present against all the non mandatoryField

elements.name: Verify that user can use upload feature

steps.name: user navigates to the direct shift url
user clicks on the upload button and uploads a pdf file

elements.name: Verify that user can fill all the details and apply for the Job

steps.name: user navigates to the direct shift url
user Fills valid details in form
